EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Training portal acces reissued
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Reissue Account Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Your account information entered does not provide sufficient data to enable access to the training portal and class registration.
· Your information must be associated with an active company account, in the Honeywell system
· Your company’s account must be established with Honeywell, before employees can setup and link their accounts
· The company account identifies and establishes the products and services we provide to your organization
· Please ensure all your account data is complete, as this is associated to products and services you are eligible to receive, incomplete data delays access to class registration
· Note - the primary email address entered on your account, must be a company email address
· Email addresses such as Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, etc., are not identified company addresses and delay your request for access
Please contact us with any questions.
Honeywell – CAE Training Alliance
1-602-365-2833
training.solutions2@honeywell.com
